model.map

Class MapEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.map.MapEditor

  • public class MapEditor
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is for functions such as add, delete continents and countries in the map file.
    Author:
    Yann Kerichard, Yueshuai Jiang, Che-Shao Chen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Map map
      the map data that for the map editor to edit

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapEditor()
      Create a new and empty map.

      • map

        public Map map
        the map data that for the map editor to edit

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapEditor

        public MapEditor()
        Create a new and empty map. If need to load existing map, please see function load().

    • Method Detail

      • changeState

        public void changeState()
        If the data has been changed, call this function to notify observers.

      • addContinent

        public void addContinent(Continent cont)
        Add a qualified continent to the local variables.
        Parameters:
        cont - The input continent.

      • deleteContinent

        public boolean deleteContinent(int contNumber)
        Delete the input continent, and remove the countries inside and their links
        Parameters:
        contNumber - The target continent needed to remove.
        Returns:
        Returning true if the input continent is exist, otherwise return false

      • addCountry

        public void addCountry(Country ctry)
        Add a qualified Country to the local variables, then build the neighbor links.
        Parameters:
        ctry - The input Country.

      • deleteCountry

        public boolean deleteCountry(int ctryNumber)
        Delete the target Country, also remove all links in its neighbors.
        Parameters:
        ctryNumber - The target Country needed to be removed with int type.
        Returns:
        Returning true if the input suit with an existing country, otherwise return false

      • deleteCountry

        public void deleteCountry(Country c)
        The method for deleting country in the map file
        Parameters:
        c - the selected country

      • findContinent

        private Continent findContinent(java.lang.String name)
        Find and return a continent giving a name. In case is does not exist, return null
        Parameters:
        name - The input continent name
        Returns:
        Returning continent type if the continent is found, otherwise return null

      • findCountry

        private Country findCountry(java.lang.String name)
        Find and return a country giving a name. In case is does not exist, return null
        Parameters:
        name - The input country name
        Returns:
        Returning country type if the country is found, otherwise return null

      • connect

        private void connect(Country ctry,
                     Country neighbor)
        Create a connection between 2 countries. It generate a link in both side
        Parameters:
        ctry - The current country
        neighbor - The current country's neighbor

      • disconnect

        private void disconnect(Country c)
        To remove all the connections made between a specific country and the other countries
        Parameters:
        c - country that need to remove

      • setMapName

        public void setMapName(java.lang.String mapName)
        Setting the map name
        Parameters:
        mapName - The current map name

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String mapFilePath)
        The loading function for map files
        Parameters:
        mapFilePath - The selected map file path with string type

      • getCountry

        public Country getCountry(int inputNumber)
        Translate the number displayed and entered by the user to the selected country
        Parameters:
        inputNumber - number entered by the user
        Returns:
        Returning country type if the input suit to the countries in the map file, otherwise return null.

      • getContinent

        public Continent getContinent(int inputNumber)
        Translate the number displayed and entered by the user to the selected continent
        Parameters:
        inputNumber - number entered by the user
        Returns:
        Returning Continent type if the continent found in the map, otherwise return null.

      • addCountry

        public boolean addCountry(java.lang.String ctryName,
                          int contNb,
                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> neighborNumbers)
        The method for adding countries and the neighbor
        Parameters:
        ctryName - The target country with string type
        contNb - The number of continents
        neighborNumbers - Neighbor numbers of a country
        Returns:
        Returning false if countries have the same name, continent number is wrong, or neighbor is wrong. Otherwise return true.

      • getMaxInputNumber

        public int getMaxInputNumber()
        Calculate the number of countries and continent that are displayed, so the user can't choose a greater number.
        Returns:
        Returning the max possible input.

      • addContinent

        public boolean addContinent(java.lang.String continentName,
                            int bonus)
        to add a new continent
        Parameters:
        continentName - the name of the new continent
        bonus - bonus armies of the continent
        Returns:
        Returning false if find the added continent name is already exist, otherwise return true

      • save

        public void save()
        save and generate the .map file

      • extractInfo

        private java.lang.String extractInfo(Map map)
        to extract map info into the string
        Parameters:
        map - the map that needs to be saved
        Returns:
        the string form of the map

      • generate

        public static void generate(java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.String content)
        The function to generate the new file name and new properties that content in the map file
        Parameters:
        fileName - The selected file name
        content - The string that content in the file
